Offensive_Quality.Desc: You gain a +4 bonus to your Initiative modifier
You gain a +1 bonus to your Accuracy Checks
You gain a +1 bonus to your Magic Checks
When you recover HP, you recover 5 extra HP
Spells you cast that whose effects restore HP will restore 5 extra HP
Spells you cast deal 5 extra damage
Your attacks with (choose one: melee, ranged) weapons deal 5 extra damage

Defensive_Quality.Desc: You gain +1 bonus to Magic Defense.
You have Resistance to physical damage.
You gain +1 bonus to Defense and Magic Defense.
You are immune to all status effects.
